about_the_game:
The package includes songs from the game, all in high-quality mp3 format (320 kbps). All tracks are solo guitar songs. Additionally, there are PDF files with standard music notation and guitar tablatures for every song.

After installation, you can find everything in game destination folder.

Tracklist
Track 01 - Notes
Track 02 - Home
Track 03 - Distance
Track 04 - Calm Sea

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

name: NOTES - Soundtrack + Music Sheets

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphic card supporting DirectX 9.0
